descriptionHtml:
She is a powerful Breton conjurer and has the twin souls perk. (she does not always conjure two atronach, but sometimes yes )
You can find her at The Arcanaeum
Marriage: Yes
Note: Don\'t know if works with the quest \"The Gift\" (Dawnguard Volkihar Faction quest)


Spells
Conjure Frost Atronach
Conjure Flame Atronach
Banish Daedra
Command Daedra
Ice Spike
Fire Bolt
Lightning Bolt
Flames
Oak Flesh

Hope you enjoy ^_^
author: Frodnar666
